price: Àwọn ọlọ́hun tí wọ́n sọ di ohun tí ó máa mú wọn súnmọ́ (ìgbàlà) lẹ́yìn Allāhu kò ṣe ràn wọ́n lọ́wọ́ mọ́? Rárá (kò lè sí àrànṣe fún wọn)! Wọ́n ti di ofò mọ́ wọn lọ́wọ́. Ìyẹn sì ni (ọlọ́hun) irọ́ wọn àti ohun tí wọ́n ń dá ní àdápa irọ́.
arabic: فَلَوۡلَا نَصَرَهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ قُرۡبَانًا ءَالِهَةَۢۖ بَلۡ ضَلُّواْ عَنۡهُمۡۚ وَذَٰلِكَ إِفۡكُهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: falawlā naṣarahumu alladhīna ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi qur'bānan ālihatan bal ḍallū ʿanhum wadhālika if'kuhum wamā kānū yaftarūna
translations: gods as a way of approach
gods as a way of approach
